name: denominate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to express an amount of money in a particular currency (= units of money): Oil sales were denominated in US dollars.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to use a particular currency to do something: denominate sth in dollars/euros, etc. Foreign sales are denominated in US dollars.
